section_a.beneficiaries: al The company’s activities will provide benefit to communities by promoting a culture of collaboration, inclusivity, and social impact through increasing the opportunities for people with physical and intellectual disabilities to access physical activity. This done by sharing resources, attracting more participants, and identifying and developing vulnerable people that would benefit from accessing physical activity. Sport Together Berkshire's activities will provide benefit to communities across Berkshire by increasing the opportunities for people within the Special Educational Needs and Disabilities (SEND) community. The CIC is made up, initially, of clubs from Football, Rugby, Cricket and Basketball with Disability sections. We will work with schools and run events throughout the year to increase opportunities for participation in physical activities. The CIC will promote a culture of collaboration, inclusivity, and social impact. The CIC will set out to share resources, attract more participants, and identify and develop vulnerable peaple who would benefit from greater access to physical activity. Additionally, through networking opportunities and joint events, sports clubs can help to strengthen community bonds and promote healthy lifestyles, positive values, and behaviours
